track.name: Soldier's Things
comments: From the movie Jarhead. This is how I got into Tom Waits.
I'm so glad Tom was inducted into RnRHoF.

Wow, I just looked up Paul Young's version because of the post below. He's definitely going to hell for that one. Never underestimated the eighties ability to turn anything, even as beautiful as Soldier's Things, into utter crap.
This song is very beautiful and I also adore Paul Young's version which became a hit.
too many cigerettes. but this song is freakin great. It makes me want to cry.  Very emotional
some of his best piano man work.
Ex service men - we all feel this one don't we? Hero's/villains what ever your views!
*CRY* I LOVE the Melancholy in "soldiers things"
sensibilidad no es lo mismo que sensibleria. Thx Tom
ten kawałek nigdy mnie nie znudzi...
For all the soldiers out there, to come back safely home...
